q: and ran a decade, gave national exposure to musicians including Joel and the Police. Don Kirshner also helped launch the careers of Lionel Richie and Ozzy Osborne. The show also boosted careers of comics including David Letterman . Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the title="Popular Music(genre)" href="http://www.chicagotribune.com/topic/arts-culture/genres/popular-music-%28genre%29-01011004.topic"> popular music business, Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how title="Rock and Roll(genre)" href="http://www.chicagotribune.com/topic/arts-culture/genres/rock-roll-%28genre%29-01011006.topic"> rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording
